about_the_game:
There's a person inside the vending machine!

[The background and story of the game]



Urban fantasy game set in a city where strange beings live in hiding.
Examine the bizarre city with Nabi, the protagonist tasked with monitoring and managing strange beings.


Vending machines that exist everywhere in the city, and no one cares.
Nabi lives in a vending machine in the city and is an investigator for MonsterA, which keeps out strange beings from the public. What other incidents should we investigate and resolve today?

What kind of drink would you like?

[Drink a variety of drinks and use your fun skills]



A Nabi can use its power as a drink. What kind of drinks do you like? Try some fun abilities while drinking your favorite drinks?

[Take care of the vending machine]



Research new drinks in vending machines, and launch them. They will be very helpful for researcher activities.


Earn activity money by selling drinks with the investigator's supporter Oracle.
Various research activities and upgrades always require money.

Oh, by the way! And it's more comfortable than you think…

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400); AMD FX-4300 (4 * 3800)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 Ti (1024 VRAM); Radeon HD 7750 (1024 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 VRAM); Radeon R9 380 (2048 VRAM)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Urban Fantasy-based Action Roguelike & Vending Machine Management game.Be the main character [Nabi] living in a vending machine and keep an eye on the world's troublesome beings and manage the vending machine!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
